snippet: Richard B. Handler was one of the better paid chief executives on Wall Street when he ran the Jefferies Group. Now, after the Leucadia National Corporation acquired Jefferies, his compensation has fallen by more than 80 percent.
abstract: Richard B. Handler was one of the better paid chief executives on Wall Street when he ran the Jefferies Group. Now, after the Leucadia National Corporation acquired Jefferies, his compensation has fallen by more than 80 percent.

headline.main: Handler, Leucadia's Chief, Takes Pay Cut in New Role
